304: Who You AreIf you are a top-notch Payroll Leader who thrives on technology and process innovation in a fast-paced environment, Agilysys has an immediate career-building opportunity for you. In this role you will be a highly productive member of the Company's Office of the CFO based in Alpharetta, GA working with business leaders and colleagues across the Finance, Accounting, Treasury, Tax, Legal and Human Resource teams of our dynamic organization.Who We AreWe are a global, publicly traded, and well-respected hospitality technology innovator ready to accelerate our growth by showcasing the meaningful investments we've made over the past several years to convert our 40-year hospitality heritage into the most comprehensive, state-of-the-art, personalized, and expertly supported solutions available, whether in cloud-native SaaS or on-premise license formats. We are at the forefront of delivering technology to shape the future of hospitality: Mobile contactless keyless guest-controlled real-time capacity-shaped anytime, anywhere personal-yet-profitable experiences.Leveraging our market-proven Property Management, Point-of-Sale, and Inventory & Procurement core solutions, more than 20 additional solutions enhance guest and staff experiences across every touchpoint while also unifying data and profiles to continuously predict and optimize future interactions. Many of the world's best known and admired hospitality brands and properties count on our solutions to improve work experiences for staff members and guest experiences for customers, solidifying loyalty and amplifying revenue while also removing operating friction and costs.Agilysys has been a leader in hospitality software for more than 40 years, delivering innovative guest-centric technology solutions for gaming, hotels, resorts and cruise, corporate foodservice management, restaurants, universities, healthcare, and sports and entertainment. Agilysys offers the most comprehensive software solutions in the industry, including point-of-sale (POS), property management (PMS), inventory and procurement, payments, and related applications, to manage the entire guest journey. Agilysys is known for its leadership in hospitality, its broad product offerings and its customer-centric service. Some of the largest hospitality companies around the world use Agilysys solutions to help improve guest loyalty, drive revenue growth and increase operational efficiencies. Agilysys operates across the Americas, Europe, the Middle East, Asia-Pacific, and India with headquarters located in Alpharetta, GA.SummaryAgilysys is currently looking for a Payroll Leader to work out of our Alpharetta* headquarters.
